programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (20/21)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (9/21)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Les aventures de Blue à New York
programme.desc: When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy's Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to New York City where they discover the magic of music and dance and following your dreams!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo»Abuelo's Treasure: The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day! (S2, ep 6b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait de l'exercice) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait de l'exercice»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (49/78)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (50/78)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fête le printemps) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Blue fête le printemps»It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Dora l'exploratrice (Dora au pays des merveilles) S7 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Dora au pays des merveilles»In an update on Alice in Wonderland, Dora and Boots enter a looking glass world filled with fantastic creatures and exciting places so they can save their kitties who are headed to the tea party with the cranky Queen of Hearts.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steel Antlers / Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Steel Antlers / Berry Bad»Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la ferme pédagogique) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la ferme pédagogique»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chanson de Blue) S1 (8/17)
programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (13/18)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (16/21)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Les aventures de Blue à New York
programme.desc: When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy's Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to New York City where they discover the magic of music and dance and following your dreams!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bosse de maman Rabbit) S4 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La bosse de maman Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pendule à coucou) S2 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La pendule à coucou»The old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom hasn't worked for sometime. So, Daddy Pig winds it up. The clock strikes the hour and a wooden cuckoo pops out, flapping its wings and singing "Cuckoo!!" Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George was looking the wrong way and has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Mademoiselle Lapin s'est blessée à la cheville. Sa soeur et ses amis proposent alors de la remplacer au stand de glaces, au supermarché et aux autres endroits où elle travaille...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dauphin à bord) S7 (6/7)
programme.desc: «Dauphin à bord»When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course folle des skis à réaction) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «La course folle des skis à réaction»Crusher thinks he can beat Blaze with his rocket skis, but the rocket skis run wild and send Crusher in the wrong direction. Crusher's grandmother helps Blaze and AJ to bring Crusher to a stop.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le plus gros navet du monde / Aimant maudit) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Le plus gros navet du monde / Aimant maudit»Sir Steel almost crushes Platinum city with a giant turnip during a Vegetable Show. // When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Baddy Long Legs) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Baddy Long Legs»The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (20/21)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (9/21)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Les aventures de Blue à New York
programme.desc: When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy's Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to New York City where they discover the magic of music and dance and following your dreams!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «A la recherche du trésor d'Abuelo»Abuelo's Treasure: The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day! (S2, ep 6b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington fait de l'exercice) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington fait de l'exercice»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les clefs perdues) S4 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les clefs perdues»Peppa and her family go on a trip to a mountain beauty spot, but Daddy Pig accidentally drops the car keys down a very deep drain. He tries to reach the keys with a stick and a fishing rod but he can't, so he enlists the help from Mr. Bull and his road crew.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le nounours de la garderie) S4 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Le nounours de la garderie»George's New Dinosaur: George pays a visit to Mr Fox's Shop after his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur breaks. With all the additional features surely Dino Roar is a good replacement?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (53/78)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (54/78)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican»When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (5/20)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !) S2 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (1/78)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (2/78)
programme.desc: «The Swing»The Swing: When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing! (S1, ep 2).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christophe) S1 (4/78)
programme.desc: «Super Christophe»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»Peppa et Suzy comprennent que les adultes doivent travailler toute la journée. Elles font alors semblant de travailler dans une boutique à la garderie et trouvent cette tâche épuisante...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (From One Pit to Another) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «From One Pit to Another»The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Amis à grande vitesse) S3 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Amis à grande vitesse»Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La chasse aux outils) S1 (4/20)
programme.desc: «La chasse aux outils»Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue) S2 (2/20)
programme.desc: «Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue»Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Wheel of Steel) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Wheel of Steel»Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!
